titleStmt.title: The Former rates being printed by a false copy before both Houses were agreed we here present you with a true account of the rates for poll-money, how every one is setted throughout the kingdome as it was drawne up by consent of both Houses, and made an act of Parliament by the Kings consent on the third of Iuly, 1641 : and since printed at large with two other acts for an utter suppressing the Star-Chamber and High-Commission Courts, and for regulating the Counsell Table.

The Former rates being printed by a false copy before both Houses were agreed we here present you with a true account of the rates for poll-money, how every one is setted throughout the kingdome as it was drawne up by consent of both Houses, and made an act of Parliament by the Kings consent on the third of Iuly, 1641 : and since printed at large with two other acts for an utter suppressing the Star-Chamber and High-Commission Courts, and for regulating the Counsell Table.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of London.
